title: Super Bowl LV Quiz
description: Test your knowledge about Super Bowl LV curisioties

questions.title: The Super Bowl LV marks the first time the match-up includes the winning QB in the previous two Super Bowls
Respectively, including SB LV, how many times TB12 have played the super bowl; how many decades he appeared in the SB; and if he wins, how many rings he have
In 31 regular season starts, Patrick Mohomes holds the mark for highest quarterback rating. What's the rating?
PT15 and TB12 age difference is the largest age difference between starting quarterbacks in Super Bowl history. How old is the difference?
From the list below who are Tampa Bay Buccaneers players?
alternatives: Charvarius Ward, Chris Godwin, Antonio Brown and Scotty Miller
Mike Evans, Rob Gronkowski, Ronald Jones and Devin White
Mike Evans, L'Jarius Sneed, Rashad Fenton and Scotty Miller
Mike Evans, Chris Godwin, Mitchell Schwartz and Andy Reid

questions.title: From the list below who are Kansas City Chiefs players?
alternatives: Bashaud Breeland, Chris Godwin, Mitchell Schwartz and Andy Reid
Chris Jones, L'Jarius Sneed, Rashad Fenton and Scotty Miller
Mike Evans, Eric Fisher, Mike Remmers and Darrel Williams
Travis Kelce, Clyde Edwards-Helaire, Tyreek Hill and Tyrann Mathieu

questions.title: Which of the options below are violations in the NFL?
questions.description: A little bit more about rules...
alternatives: Pass interference, Out-of-Bounds and Offensive Three-Second Rule
Pass interference, Strike the Ball and Obstruction
Pass interference, Illegal blind side block and Roughing the passer
Pass interference, Unsportmanlike Conduct and Charging the mound

questions.title: During halftime of the Super Bowl, the NFL typically presents an extravagant musical performance. Who will sing in the SB LV?
questions.description: SB ever has good musical performance...
